content: उपधा {c3c} <ab>U.</ab> {@--1@} To place or lay upon, place under or in; अधिजानु बाहुमपधाय <ls>Śi. 9. 54</ls>; उपहितं शिशिरापगमश्रिया मुकुलजालमशोभत किंशुके <ls>R. 9. 31</ls>; <ls>Bk. 15. 47</ls>; <ls>Ku. 1. 44</ls>; हृदि चैनामुपधातुमर्हसि <ls>R. 8. 77</ls> treasure uplay to heart; <ls>Ms. 4. 54</ls>; उपहितसूक्ष्मग्रंथिना <ls>Ś. 1. 19.</ls> {@--2@} To place, lay; वामहस्तोपहितवदना <ls>Ś. 4</ls> resting on. {@--3@} ({%a%}) To place near; <ls>Mv. 4. 56.</ls> ({%b%}) To put to or yoke (as a horse to a carriage &c.). {@--4@} To cause, bring on or produce; <ls>Mk. 1. 53.</ls> {@--5@} To impose, entrust with, charge with (as a duty); तदुपहितकुदुंबः <ls>R. 7. 71.</ls> {@--6@} To lay a command upon, enjoin, instruct in (with <ab>acc.</ab>); स्त्रीषु नृत्यमुपधाय शिक्षयन् <ls>R. 19. 36.</ls> {@--7@} To lie down upon, use as a pillow; उपधाय वामभुजमशयिषि <ls>Dk. 111.</ls> {@--8@} To apply, employ, lay or bestow upon, क्रिया हि वस्तूपहिता प्रसीदति <ls>R. 3. 29.</ls> {@--9@} To place over, cover, conceal. {@--10@} To add, place in addition. {@--11@} To communicate, impart, give, bestow; उपहितशोभा <ls>Bk. 2. 55.</ls> {@--12@} To locate; एतदुपहितं चैतन्यं <ls>Vedānta S.</ls> {@--13@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) To precede without the intervention of another syllable.

उपधा {@--1@} Imposition, forgery, fraud, deceit, trick, pretence; <ls>Ms. 8. 193.</ls> {@--2@} Trial or test of honesty, (धर्माद्यैर्यत्परीक्षणं); (said to be of {4} kinds, {1} loyalty, {2} disinterestedness, {3} continence, {4} courage); (शोधयेत्) धर्मोपधाभिर्विप्रांश्च सर्वाभिः सचिवान् पुनः <ls>Kālikā P.</ls> {@--3@} A means or expedient; अयशोभिदुरा लोके कोपधा मरणादृते <ls>Śi. 19. 58.</ls> {@--4@} (In <ab>gram.</ab>) A penultimate letter (अंत्याद्वर्णात्पूर्व उपधा)
